name: Monkey Sailor
description:
Monkey Sailor is a FREE strategic puzzle game, brought to you by Personae Studios!

With Monkey Sailor, it’s your job to navigate the Monkey Sailor through the ocean so he can find the golden banana treasure. Along the way you’ll encounter many obstacles so make sure you have a good strategy because the clock is ticking!

With over 300 levels, there are plenty of Monkey Sailor puzzles to play. Best of all – Monkey Sailor is FREE!

INSTRUCTIONS:

Select your level to start the game. Move the Monkey Sailor through each arrow passageway to move onto the next level. Watch out for the other boats – Monkey Sailor encounters many obstacles throughout his ocean journey. Slide each boat obstacle out of the way so the Monkey Sailor can get one step closer to finding the golden banana treasure!

Monkey Sailor is a game that requires a strategy. For each puzzle, carefully plan how to get the Monkey Sailor through the passageway. Need to start over? No problem – easily reset your puzzle to start, or undo your last move. Stuck on a puzzle? Monkey Sailor includes “hints” to help you get to the next level!

FEATURES:
Over 300 puzzle levels available
Reset, undo, and hint options
Sound and music options

Stay tuned for Monkey Sailor updates! As always, we welcome your reviews and suggestions. Also, be sure to check out other popular games by Personae Studio in the iTunes App Store.
